item.title: Toxicity AI Detection Plugin
item.content:encoded:
Python Toxicity Model Chat Plugin!

Python Model, how does it work?

All credit for the model to BaldProgammer, he trained it, and setup the original API server

The model is based off of Bert's Distil models! Can't say much about ours, since we aren't open-sourcing the model part of this. But you can see the official model here!

Chat Plugin, how the model interacts with the chat.

item.title: SMP Patch Notes
item.description: The Legundo SMP recently had a huge patch update! This blog post will be going over what's changed and what you should expect to see different the next time you join.
item.content:encoded: The Legundo SMP recently had a huge patch update! This blog post will be going over what's changed and what you should expect to see different the next time you join.
